migration_metadata.migration_purpose: Standardize step template documentation with ISO codes for taxonomy integration

backwards_compatibility.migration_notes: All legacy IDs preserved in Current_ID column for reference. File format (JSON/MD) maintained in original locations.

file_format_notes.json_range: STT-001 to STT-070 - Complex steps with full metadata including execution details, tools, inputs/outputs, success criteria
file_format_notes.markdown_range: STT-071 to STT-252 - Simpler steps with basic structure using markdown format
